testcase.name: Board should be created with size and coins
Board.coinsPositions should return the coins list
Board should handle empty coins list
Board companion object apply should create board with empty coins
Board companion object apply should work with different sizes
Board getEmptyTilePositions should return all positions when board is empty
Board getEmptyTilePositions should exclude snake body positions
Board getEmptyTilePositions should exclude coin positions
Board getEmptyTilePositions should exclude both snake and coin positions
Board getEmptyTilePositions should return empty list when board is full
Board addCoin should add coin to empty position
Board addCoin should not add coin to position with existing coin
Board addCoin should not add coin to position with snake body
Board addCoin should successfully add multiple coins to different positions
